Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    xal.model.elem.ElementFactory
    This class is being phased out since it requires "registration." Currently there are no references to it and can be deleted.
    xal.tools.beam.ParameterConverter
    use RelativisticParameterConverter
    xal.tools.beam.RmsEnvelope
    Unfinished and not used anywhere
    xal.smf.scada.ScadaCheckConnect
    This class is replaced by BatchConnectionTest
    xal.model.alg.TrackerAdaptive
    functionality pushed down into child class class EnvTrackerAdapt
    xal.tools.dyn.TranslationMatrix
    Not used anywhere
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    xal.tools.collections.LinearBuffer.DEF_LEN_BUFFER 
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    xal.tools.beam.calc.CalculationEngine.calculatePhaseAdvance_old(PhaseMatrix, Twiss[], Twiss[])
    Does not determine the phase quadrants correctly and therefore cannot produce an accurate phase advance
    xal.tools.beam.calc.CalculationEngine.computeTwiss(TwissProbe, PhaseMatrix, double)
    This is the algorithm component for a TwissProbe and should not be used as the dynamics elsewhere. It has been moved to the TwissTracker class.
    xal.smf.impl.SCLCavity.getAvgTTF(double)
    Read the comments about being a hard coded kluge job.
    xal.smf.impl.SCLCavity.getFieldWithCavityOff(double, double, double, double)
    This is one of only two methods that uses stuff from outside, and that stuff is the sclcavity sub-package which is completely hard coded for the SNS SCL. We must get rid of sclcavity.
    xal.smf.impl.SCLCavity.getFieldWithCavityOff(double, double, double, double[], double)
    This is one of only two methods that uses stuff from outside, and that stuff is the sclcavity sub-package which is completely hard coded for the SNS SCL. We must get rid of sclcavity.
    xal.model.probe.ParticleProbe.getFixedOrbit()
    This is a duplicate of ParticleProbe.getPhaseCoordinates() but with a misleading name. I plan to get rid of it.
    xal.model.probe.traj.ParticleProbeState.getFixedOrbit()
    This is a duplicate of ParticleProbeState.getPhaseCoordinates() but with a misleading name. I plan to get rid of it.
    xal.model.probe.EnvelopeProbe.getSaveTwissFlag() 
    xal.model.probe.traj.EnvelopeProbeState.getSaveTwissFlag()
    associated with the redundant state variable twissParams
    xal.model.probe.EnvelopeProbe.initializeFrom(Probe<EnvelopeProbeState>)
    Never used
    xal.model.probe.Probe.initializeFrom(Probe<S>)
    This method is only called from child class overrides which are never called themselves.
    xal.model.probe.TransferMapProbe.initializeFrom(Probe<TransferMapState>)
    Never Used
    xal.model.probe.TwissProbe.initializeFrom(Probe<TwissProbeState>)
    Never used
    xal.model.alg.Tracker.newFromEditContext(AcceleratorSeq)
    I want to discourage use of this method since it return the same "default" algorithm regardless the type of probe being used. Please refer to AlgorithmFactory.
    xal.model.alg.Tracker.newFromEditContext(String, AcceleratorSeq)
    I want to discourage use of this method since it return the same "default" algorithm regardless the type of probe being used. Please refer to AlgorithmFactory.
    xal.model.probe.Probe.performPostProcessing()
    I don't think this gets used.
    xal.tools.messaging.MessageCenter.registerSource(Object, Class<T>, boolean)
    Use the version of this method that takes the synchronous type instead
    xal.model.probe.EnvelopeProbe.setSaveTwissFlag(boolean)
    If you want Twiss parameters, either take them from the covariance matrix or use the TwissProbe
    xal.model.probe.traj.EnvelopeProbeState.setSaveTwissFlag(boolean)
    Storing only the Twiss parameters leaves an incomplete state and may lead to erroneous results
    xal.model.probe.EnvelopeProbe.stateResponse(String, String)
    This calculation should be done using the utility class xal.tools.beam.calc.CalculationsOnMachines
    xal.model.probe.traj.Trajectory.statesForElement_OLD(String) 
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    xal.extension.wirescan.profile.ProfileData(int)
